chang2024bestpracticesexperimental.abstract: We provide twelve best practices and discuss how each practice can help researchers accurately, credibly, and ethically use Generative AI (GenAI) to enhance experimental research. We split the twelve practices into four areas. First, in the pre-treatment stage, we discuss how GenAI can aid in pre-registration procedures, data privacy concerns, and ethical considerations specific to GenAI usage. Second, in the design and implementation stage, we focus on GenAIï¿½s role in identifying new channels of variation, piloting and documentation, and upholding the four exclusion restrictions. Third, in the analysis stage, we explore how prompting and training set bias can impact results as well as necessary steps to ensure replicability. Finally, we discuss forward-looking best practices that are likely to gain importance as GenAI evolves.
chang2024bestpracticesexperimental.author: Chang, Samuel and Kennedy, Andrew and Leonard, Aaron and List, John A
chang2024bestpracticesexperimental.title: 12 Best Practices for Leveraging Generative AI in Experimental Research

dowlingl23.keywords: ChatGPT, Artificial intelligence, Finance research, Ethics
dowlingl23.abstract: We show, based on ratings by finance journal reviewers of generated output, that the recently released AI chatbot ChatGPT can significantly assist with finance research. In principle, these results should be generalisable across research domains. There are clear advantages for idea generation and data identification. The technology, however, is weaker on literature synthesis and developing appropriate testing frameworks. Importantly, we further demonstrate that the extent of private data and researcher domain expertise input, are key factors in determining the quality of output. We conclude by considering the implications, particularly the ethical implications, which arise from this new technology.
dowlingl23.author: Michael Dowling and Brian Lucey
dowlingl23.title: ChatGPT for (Finance) research: The {Bananarama} Conjecture
